data.text: @Keitikinz @BlackKnight10k @Walgreens @cvspharmacy I was able to get my 4 th at my local health dept. no questions asked. But I live in a very rural area.

@Keitikinz Thanks for clarifying, Keiti.  I am sorry for my misunderstanding and will be glad to have management look into this for you.  Please message to provide some additional details about your experience.  ^MK https://t.co/cmpqeQRmeA
@Walgreens I won't schedule another appointment with Walgreen's because I was refused service. I am asking for an explanation of why that is.

@Keitikinz Thanks for contacting us. If you're still having difficulty in making this appointment, we welcome you to call 1-800-925-4733. The representative that you speak with can transfer you through to make an appointment with our voice scheduler or the agent can assist you.  ^MK
@Keitikinz @BlackKnight10k I hope you can find some place you're able to get one. 💔
@Keitikinz @BlackKnight10k @Walgreens @cvspharmacy Oh no! I was wanting to get a second booster.
Thank you @BlackKnight10k for retweeting. I really need answers. This has been so distressing being treated so rudely and callously. I'm trying not to die.
